Description_lang: Arcane Surge increases Spell Damage by an additional $s1% and its duration is increased by ${$s3/1000} sec.

description_blz.en_US: Arcane Surge increases Spell Damage by an additional 10% and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Oleada arcana aumenta un 10% más el daño con hechizos y aumenta 3 s la duración.
description_blz.pt_BR: Surto Arcano aumenta o dano mágico em mais 10% e sua duração é aumentada em 3 s.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Arkane Woge' erhöht den Zauberschaden um zusätzlich 10% und der Effekt hält 3 Sek. länger an.
description_blz.en_GB: Arcane Surge increases Spell Damage by an additional 10% and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Oleada Arcana aumenta un 10% más el daño con hechizos y 3 s su duración.
description_blz.fr_FR: Éruption d’arcanes augmente les dégâts des sorts de 10% supplémentaires et sa durée est prolongée de 3 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Eruzione Arcana aumenta i danni magici inflitti del 10% aggiuntivo e la sua durata aumenta di 3 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Чародейский выброс" увеличивает урон от заклинаний еще на 10% и длится на 3 сек. дольше.
description_blz.ko_KR: 비전 쇄도 시전 시 주문 공격력이 추가로 10%만큼, 지속시간은 3초만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 秘法奔騰使法術傷害額外提高10%，並使其持續時間延長3秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 奥术涌动使法术伤害额外提高10%，持续时间延长3秒。
